A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Pros:
- Intro space battle scene.
- #reylo
- Joker-faced Mark Hamill.
- The Lanais
- Cameo and callbacks done right.
- "It's all a machine man."
- Throne room.
- Rey's "backstory". Say it.
- Hyperspace meets anime.
- Samurai-influenced wideshot.
- Matrix Luke Skywalker.
- Crait.
- "This is how we're going to win - not by fighting what we hate\, but saving what we love."

Cons:
- MCU-influenced comedy is so out of place.
- "Best movie since Empire"\, says no one ever.
- Where is the Rian Johnson who gave me my best TV moment?
- John Williams.... what happened to you..??
- Did Zack Snyder come to direct a scene?
- Feel free to blame Poe Dameron for everything.
- Canto Bight is a waste of time.
- Phasma is pointless. Bring back TR8R.
- Doesn't matter if Snoke was Darth Plagueis or not. Pointless.
- So is the Jedi teaching necessary to save the universe\, or not? Make up your mind\, Disney.
- The Porgs are a money making scheme.
- Chewbacca needs more screen time.
- May the force be with you\, JJ Abrams.
